resources.string: I can't believe this happened…
So much destruction… I'm amazed anyone survived this.
What horrors have occurred here…
Proud Caer Dun… now in shambles.
From the Ashes of Caer Dun
After the sacking of Caer Dun, the Soulwardens risk losing everything if the Tempest strikes again. In order to survive, they must relocate to the presumed safety of Ebonscale Reach.
I'm sorry, I should pull myself together. Yonas would want us to push on, but I don't know how. The Wardens… is this the end?
"No. We must regroup."
Regroup! Where!? I thought we were safe here, but I was wrong... about so much.
I need time to think, to mourn. I cannot consider the future until I've reckoned with what's just happened.
"We can't stay here long."
Of course. Where you lead, I will follow. Perhaps Sun or Grace has some idea of where we might find safe harbor.
Proud Caer Dun… now in shambles.
What horrors have occurred here…
I will follow you soon. I recognize there is nothing here left to protect. Only ash.
Well, this is a right mess now, isn't it? I had really come to like the old man, and now he's gone. It's just rotten.
Talk to Sun Fuchun about finding a safe refuge
Yonas… the poor man. Did he suffer? I suppose he must have. The question is… now what?
"We need a new home."
I have traveled extensively in my time on Aeternum, but I've only ever felt safe in Ebonscale Reach.
Ebonscale is a land protected by Empress Zhou Taiying. I remain her loyal subject still, and she is a personal friend.
"That sounds like perfect refuge."
Few Soulwardens remain, but I can lead them west. Perhaps Grace can help… if she's willing to join us.
Convince Grace O'Malley to escort the survivors
Follow Sun Fuchun to Ebonscale Reach
(Optional) Use the Spirit Shrine
Find the missing Soulwardens near the ambush site
With the old man gone, everyone'll be looking to you to tell them where we go. I don't envy you the weight of that decision.
"We're going to Ebonscale."
Ah, then Sun will be leading the Wardens west, will she? Hm. Now where will fortune be leading Grace O'Malley, you think?
"We could use your help."
Well, since you asked so nicely, how can I refuse? Besides, they'll need me to watch their backs. Alright then, see you there!
Rejoin your allies in Ebonscale Reach
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the situation in Ebonscale Reach
Thank goodness you're here! It's all my fault - I led the Wardens right into an ambush. The Corrupted were waiting.
"They've taken Ebonscale?"
I hope not. Surely, the Empress was prepared and she and her loyal warriors remain safe… but this area seems to have fallen.
We need to find the others. It all happened so fast, they came charging at us from all sides, and everyone scattered.
"What about Grace?"
She was here, pistols blazing… or we would have fallen. They all went north through the forest. Please, go after them.
She was here, pistols blazing… or we would have fallen. They all went north towards Skysong Temple. Please, go after them.
She was here, pistols blazing… or we would have fallen. They all went north through the forest. Please, go after them.
I feel terrible. I promised everyone we'd be safe here.
Rescue Soulwarden Samira
Rescue Soulwarden Wayne
My thanks, Warden! Hurry after Wayne. He tried to make a break for it, but I don't know if he was able to dodge the patrols.
"I'll find him. Don't worry."
Good. I will look for Constance and Walker. We'll all meet up with you shortly.
Glad you're here! I was following the noise of Grace's gunshots, but… they've gone silent now.
"That means she finished them off."
At least there's some good news in all this mess.
Search for Grace O'Malley deeper in the forest
Talk to Grace O'Malley about the ambush
Look at you, here to finish the job. Did you find the others then? I was planning to circle back, you know.
"They're safe."
Good. I thought all was lost for a minute there. What I want to know is how the the red-eyed rotters knew we were coming.
There's time for questions after, though. Right now, we gotta get back our banner… the Soulwarden banner.
"The Corrupted have it?"
Yeah, and I was hot on their heels. I may not be a Warden proper, but a flag's not something you let slip away.
The Corrupted tore it to pieces, scattered it around their camp. I figure it's your turn to have some fun. I'll wait here.
I'll keep an eye out for the others till you get back. Then we can plan our next steps.
We are bound together, you and I… you've taught me so much, including your weaknesses.
Recover the Soulwarden Flag Pieces
Search western Corrupted Camp
Collect the Soulwarden Flag Pieces
Search eastern Corrupted Camp
Collect the Soulwarden Flag Pieces
Your banner is destroyed, your followers demoralized. You are defeated, you just haven't realized it yet.
You thought you'd be safe here, but this land is mine too. Where will your Wardens go now? You cannot hide from me.
Meet up with Grace O'Malley
Talk to Grace O'Malley about the Tempest's spying
Now there's a spot of hope! We'll get that banner mended, just as soon as we find a safe place to make camp.
"If I'm there, you won't be safe."
Now why would you go and say a thing like that? You've been the savior at every turn!
Or... Is it because that demon lady has her hooks in you? Is that it? That's how she knew… I'll be damned.
"I need her out of my head."
Maybe there's some mystical solution here. Ask Sun, why don't you? I'll lead the others, but… I won't say where, eh!
Thank you for finding the other Soulwardens. I should have exercised more caution. But I never imagined the Corrupted… here?
Discord and Balance

With the reveal that the Tempest can see through your eyes, the Soulwardens remain on the verge of destruction. On counsel from Sun Fuchun, a plan is devised to seek out her old master who might be able to help if he has not fallen to Corruption.
I must seek to learn the Empress's fate at the earliest opportunity - after we have found somewhere secure.
"No one is secure with me."
You mean… of course. The thought had crossed my mind that the Tempest was seeing through your eyes.
If there is any way to purify your consciousness, there is a master here who would know. His name is Qi Shen.
"Where do I find him?"
Skysong Temple. Even if it has fallen, Master Qi may be undisturbed. Seek him out… I hope he can help.
A Temple nearby. Even if it has fallen, Master Qi may be undisturbed. Seek him out… I hope he can help.
If Master Qi has fallen to Corruption… this day will grow darker indeed.
I'll keep an eye out for the others till you get back. Then we can plan our next steps.
If Master Qi has fallen to Corruption… this day will grow darker indeed.
To be present in life is to be free.
Travel to {POITags} to find Sun Fuchun's old master
Search Skysong Temple for Qi Shen
Follow the trail of Qi Shen's writing
Talk to Qi Shen about the risk you pose to your allies
A rare visitor, in these times. But you are most welcome to join me in my meditations.
"I need your help."
Yes, you do. I can sense from here the discord in your thoughts, and your... unwelcome observer.
You seek to wall off your senses to this menacing presence. Yes, I can see why. You endanger all those around you.
"It has cost us dearly."
Truly there is no end to the mysteries and tragedies on the isle of Aeternum. Perhaps I can help you restore harmony.
But first, you must find a center. Come, relax and calm the torrent of your mind. I will explain.
Without reflection, you will find no harmony. Now, come, meditate with me.
Meditate with Qi Shen
Your battle against the physical forces of evil has honor.
But the real struggle is the battle of the mind.
Consider the burdens weighing on your companions.
The internal assault this island wages against them.
Aeternum is not just a place, you see. It is a state of being.
And it will scar your soul, unless you choose to change.
Attachments to the past become a prison.
Only balance can transform that prison into a refuge.
As Warden to the souls caught in your sphere…
You must defend against the shadows darkening their hearts.
Create the island of calm within their storm…
Because on this island, where time stretches thin to no horizon…
Your soul too will be stretched thin: a shadow in the dark.
Become the light you have inside.
For you are not just in Aeternum; Aeternum is in you.
Your sense of self is in disarray… a weakness that this intruding influence is exploiting to enter your thoughts.
"How can I stop it?"
You must learn to balance the vital essences of your being. Focus them through an inner calm: your heartbeat, as though music.
Consider these three gongs. How new sounds can resonate within you. Can you cause them all to sing at once? Go. Try, and listen.
Three sources of music. But can they all sing together?
Strike the Gong of Harmony
Strike the Gong of Peace
Strike the Gong of Tranquility
Strike the Gongs of Harmony, Peace and Tranquility
Strike the other Gongs within 12 seconds...
You need to strike the Gongs faster!
You did it! The Gongs rang together...
Focus on the inner calm of self and push Isabella away
Another old fool you hope will protect you, but your efforts are wasted. I see… wait, what? You-
Talk to Qi Shen about your newfound clarity
Very good. Not so easy, is it? But did you only focus on those objects? Or did you understand the meaning behind the actions?
Continue
Your mind and body and spirit are all connected. Like the gongs, if one is in disharmony, then all will fall into discord.
But when they are in harmony, you will have the strength to keep the unwelcome observer out of your mind.
"Could she invade my mind again?"
As long as you maintain your balance, your mind will be a temple she cannot enter. Take this lesson, and return to your allies.
Reflect on the lesson. I think you will find much benefit in its simplicity.
Return to your allies now that you've closed off your mind
Hold on! What are you thinking, coming this way? I finally find a spot of safety, and you come waltzing in, eyes wide open!
"It's safe now. She's gone."
You got her out of your head? After all this time, that's got to be a relief. I get a headache just thinking of that woman.
"She's still not defeated."
Yeah, and the Corrupted are in this land full force. We've got our work cut out for us. Glad you're back to share the load!
Together, Without a Home

Now that the Tempest is blinded to your whereabouts and actions, the survival of the Soulwardens is starting to become possible. Rejoin them at the temporary refuge scouted out by Grace O'Malley and bring them necessary supplies.
Lucky for you, your pal Grace has an eye for places to duck and hide, and I found a spot as safe as can be hoped for.
"Where's everyone else?"
They're west up into the hills, at a fine spot by an overhang. I've just been scouting out the area for Corrupted.
There's a wee force of the crimson bastards infesting the shrine up ahead. We'll have to be wary of them.
"Or I could drive them off."
Now that's what a fine First Mate would say! Reminds me of when we first met, it does. A long road between there and here.
Say, while you're mopping up, maybe you could snatch some supplies too. We're running lean. I'll meet you at camp.
Got some more scouting to do before I head back. I'll see you soon enough.
I didn't expect to see you back among us so soon. Have you spoken to Yash yet?
Got some more scouting to do before I head back. I'll see you soon enough.
Travel to Corrupted {POITags} to collect supplies the Soulwardens will need to survive
Steal the Corrupted Supply Bundle
Steal the Corrupted Weapons Crate
Travel to the new Soulwarden Refuge
Talk to Yash Zafar about the situation in the refuge
I see you're safe, and are those supplies? We can certainly put those to use right away. This place hardly feels like home.
Continue
This doesn't feel right. I do not trust in Grace's choice of shelter. It feels like we are very much exposed here.
"We can disguise the tents."
With gathered vines and wood? I… guess that would help. If you'd cover the tents, I'd feel a little better.
With gathered stone and green wood? I… guess that would help. If you'd cover the tents, I'd feel a little better.
With gathered vines and wood? I… guess that would help. If you'd cover the tents, I'd feel a little better.
Disguising the tents will make us a little less exposed, but I still don't like this place…
Hopefully the Tempest will not find us here… I could not face her again.
I hate seeing everyone so demoralized. But at least we are all together.
Yash is sad, I know, but we all are, and he's the only one who's not helping organize the camp.
The mountains here are incredible. If only... we could have journeyed here under happier circumstances.
So many of us gone now… Are the Soulwardens finished, do you think?
I never had the chance to tell Yonas those old stories of mine. He was so patient with me. And I was so… uncertain.
Cover the tents on the northside
Cover the tents on the eastside
Talk to Yash Zafar about the new banner
Thank you. I'm sorry if I was rude before. Everyone's efforts to make this camp feel more safe are… appreciated.
"You should help too."
I should, yes. I know. I just need a little more time to center myself and get my bearings. Come and speak with me later.
Please. I need some time, Warden.
I didn't expect to see you back among us so soon. Does this mean you found Qi Shen and dispelled the Tempest's spying?
"Yes. He was very helpful."
Truly that is a relief to hear. Like birdsong after a miserable storm. I hope that boosts the Soulwardens' spirits.
A New Beginning
Survival is not enough. The gloom permeating the Soulwarden Refuge is palpable. Find a way with Grace O'Malley to raise morale and remind everyone of the need to keep hope alive.
The hope and drive we had at Caer Dun seem impossible to recreate. Everyone is despondent, particularly Yash.
"The loss of Yonas cut him deeply."
I am not unsympathetic. I worry, too. For my friends, and for my Empress. With your return, I feel I should search for her.
Hmmph! So he will simply accept this loss and defeat? I could not do such a thing. It is wasteful. Insulting, even.
I am not unsympathetic. I worry, too. For my friends, and for my Empress. With your return, I feel I should search for her.
"Where will you go?"
To the temple, if it has not fallen. I will return as soon as I can. Meantime, I hope you and Grace cheer up the others.
To the monastery, if it has not fallen. I will return as soon as I can. Meantime, I hope you and Grace cheer up the others.
To the temple, if it has not fallen. I will return as soon as I can. Meantime, I hope you and Grace cheer up the others.
I will seek out the Empress, wherever she is.
Go to Grace O'Malley
Talk to Grace O'Malley about boosting morale
So Sun's finally setting out to search for her precious Empress? Don't get me wrong, we could use allies right now.
Continue
But I have doubts. Not like we're coming off a lucky streak! And the mood around here… I've attended livelier funerals.
"We need to inspire them."
We do. I know grim. I've robbed graves before, and let me tell you, that's grim! At least there was some loot in it, though.
I got one idea, at least. Still have that poor torn flag. Maybe you could… stitch it back together! Mend it all up!
I got one idea, at least. When no one was looking, I put my sewing skills to work and got the flag mended.
I got one idea, at least. Still have that poor torn flag. Maybe you could… stitch it back together! Mend it all up!
"That's perfect."
Here you are. But maybe sewing it's not enough. I think… it needs to be a grander gesture! Like… not a flag, but… a banner!
A banner! Look at me, coming up with a project all of a sudden like that. Masterpiece of an idea, that is.
Collect wood from the environment
Gather canvas from the stolen supplies
Gather thread from the stolen supplies
Remake the Soulwarden Banner at the Refuge Table
Raise the mended Soulwarden Banner
Go to Yash Zafar
Talk to Yash Zafar about the new Soulwarden Banner
Is that… a flag from Caer Dun? The symbol of the Soulwardens. Not long ago, I was so inspired by that.
"We need to rekindle the feeling."
With this? No offense, but the stitching is rough. And the scorch marks… it's hard not to think of…
Yonas. This is exactly how he was. Scarred and broken, yet dauntless. Fighting until there was no fight left.
"Yes, and we need to honor that."
We do. I do. What a fool I've been. The true measure of heroes is how they act when hope is lost.
We are few here, but there are many Soulwardens in Great Cleave. We still have some fight left in us, don't we?
"Yes. But we need to organize."
Yes, I will rally the Wardens to the north. Thank you, I feel better now. I will return... with more Wardens!
Hm. Yash is stepping more lively. The winds are shifting - I have good news - Empress Zhou Taiying has not fallen.
The Empress of Ebonscale

With hope among the Soulwardens rekindled, there remains a need for a powerful ally if they are to overcome the Tempest. Sun Fuchun has won you an audience with the Empress of Ebonscale Reach; meet with her and forge an alliance.
The Corrupted have conquered much, but the Empress and her Dynasty forces hold the town, the monastery, and the shipyard.
The Corrupted have conquered much, but the Empress and her Dynasty forces hold the town, the temple, and the shipyard.
"Will she help us?"
That is another question. The Empress is a… complex woman with many concerns. I did not see her directly.
It will be better if you speak with the Empress. I managed to arrange an audience through her handmaiden.
"Alright. What do I need to do?"
You must prepare. An audience with the Empress requires humility, a strong mind, an open heart, and you should bring a gift.
I suggest a tea - that is the custom, and she is fond of it. Bring that to the Empress, and she will hear you out.
"Anything else?"
Yes. Be on your guard. More Dynasty warriors fall Corrupted by the hour. The Empress's defenses are tested every day.
Of the tea, I encourage you to gather an appreciable amount. Too little would be insulting; too much would be obsequious.
I am not yet ready to receive you.
Of the tea, I encourage you to gather an appreciable amount. Too little would be insulting; too much would be obsequious.
Search for tea bushes on the way to the audience
Pick Green Tea Leaves
Travel to Heavenly Rise for an audience with Empress Zhou
Search for the Empress within the mountain
Defeat the Corrupted
Travel to the Empress's Retreat
My royal audience is not yet prepared for you. Return to me at a later time.
You are welcome in Ebonscale Reach, Soulwarden. I have heard news of your deeds. Is that a gift you bring for me?
"Yes, a tea I was told you like."
Thank you. You are humble and kind to honor our customs. May our meeting bring peace under the Heavens to our peoples.
Art of War and Friendship

In order to win the favor of Empress Zhou, it is necessary to perform a ritual on the mountaintop now controlled by the Corrupted. Ascend the peak of Heavenly Rise while lighting incense, and ring the Celestial Bell to reassure the people of Ebonscale Reach that the Empress is still fighting for them.
My handmaiden tells me your order has suffered much from the Corrupted, and so it is with Ebonscale as well.
My people suffer greatly. And I fear hope is dimming within their hearts; they may even doubt if their Empress rules yet.
"We should be allies."
That would seem to be prudent, yes. But first, I must impose on you for a favor far more precious than any gift.
To reassure my people I remain their watchful Empress, we must ring the Celestial Bell, but Corrupted have taken the temple.
"I can ring it for you."
That is my request, but be cautious - my Imperial Guard found the temple impenetrable. May fortune be with you, Soulwarden.
In times of peace and strife alike, the Celestial Bell is the sound of hope.
Perform the ritual to ring the Celestial Bell
Ascend the Mountain of Heavenly Rise
Light the southern Royal Incense Burner
Light the northern Royal Incense Burner
Light the eastern Royal Incense Burner
Defeat the Captain Ren
Defeat the Colonel Shang
Ring the Celestial Bell
Return to Empress Zhou
(Optional) Use the portal to Empress's Retreat
All of Ebonscale now hears the ringing of the Celestial Bell. Surely Aeternum too hears its song. I thank you.
Lament of the Empress

Assured of your good intentions and strength, Empress Zhou reveals the tragic story of her family. Work with Sun Fuchun to find a way to heal the pains of the past, and convince the Empress that the Soulwardens are worthy of an alliance with Ebonscale Reach.
You have proven yourself a capable, honorable, and worthy friend to Ebonscale… and an enemy to the Corruption.
"We should fight it together."
That would be expected, of course. But as is often the case in political matters, there is complexity to contend with.
Before you judge me, read this book of poetry that tells of my history… and of the one dearest to me.
Poems, as I am sure you are aware, are such heartfelt stories contained in so few words.
To think I am undertaking this burden yet again…
Poems, as I am sure you are aware, are such heartfelt stories contained in so few words.
Read the Empress's Book of Poetry
My throne stolen, I sailed from my homeland an exile, dreaming of a new home for my people, and…
… my unborn child.
While so many have trouble adjusting to this island, my people took to Ebonscale Reach.
It was a rebirth of a lost dream, and we flourished. And my son thrived.
On the eve of his adulthood, a strange sickness overcame him…
And I could only watch.
Prayers! Curatives! Rituals! Wise counsel! There is nothing I did not try!
That's when the whispers began…
I vowed to find a way to breach the Stormwall, my intuition said that would save him.
Every attempt failed, and with each failure, my people's suffering increased.
Long have I known of the young upstart. But only now have I accepted her invitation to… listen.
My mother raised no fool. And yet, I admit to you, Isabella's bargain is not unreasonable.
The fleet is now ready to set sail…
Yet my balance falters upon the edge of a step I know I should not take.
Talk to Empress Zhou about her son's affliction
And so, my plight: Isabella presses upon my wisdom while the Corruption manipulates my desperation. They are strong.
Continue
I would be stronger. But ever I hear these… whispers. I am doing everything I can to resist. My options are fleeting.
"You can't give in."
Your candor is refreshing after Isabella's deceitfulness, but that does not change the facts, nor the suffering of my child.
Centuries have withered away as I indulged false hopes for a cure to my son's condition. What can you offer?
"I will find a way to heal him."
After so many disappointments, to entertain such a fantasy would require a leap of blind faith.
For the sake of my people, I will delay my decision for the time being, but know that the hours of my patience grow short.
"I understand."
I know you travel with Sun Fuchun, who failed in similar efforts in the past. Perhaps this can be her redemption.
Atop Serenity Monastery will I prepare myself, purify my spirit, come what may. And, Warden, if you succeed…
I will withdraw to the monastery to purify my spirit and await word of your efforts… though I fear they will prove futile.
Meet Sun Fuchun in Fortune's Crossing
(Optional) Use the portal to the settlement
Talk to Sun Fuchun about healing Prince Liang
Court whispers do not travel far under Empress Zhou's rule, but Lingyun has whispered to me. You seek to heal Liang?
Court whispers do not travel far under Empress Zhou's rule, but her handmaiden has whispered to me. You seek to heal Liang?
"I certainly mean to try."
Then you choose to shoulder a burden the weight of which you are wholly ignorant. That is no insult. I am impressed.
I gave my heart, mind, and soul to this same effort when I served the Empress. It was a tragedy of decades.
"Will you try with me once again?"
Yes, though with heavy heart. Prince Liang has never been far from my thoughts, but I have suppressed any hopes.
During my time studying the Angry Earth in Brightwood, and more recently in Edengrove… I thought of one new possible cure.
"We should try it."
There is a chance the elemental shrines here are linked in some primal fashion. Gather elements, and I will test this hypothesis.
I had never before considered individual plant matter connected by a deeper "root system" that was not physical.
Gather the elements for Sun Fuchun's curative
Collect {itemName}
Collect {itemName}
Collect {itemName}
Collect {itemName}
Defeat Corrupted for {itemName}
Craft the Soulsever Incense at an Arcane Repository
Bring the Elemental Ingredients to Sun Fuchun
By the light, I have a pit in my stomach. I know that was not easy, but with each moment, the Empress's patience thins.
"I have the elements."
Let me see… yes, there is a magic to them. I can't believe I failed to consider this possibility all those years ago.
I believe that, if I craft these into an incense, their aroma will create the potential for Liang's transformation.
The Tormented Prince
With your help, Sun Fuchun has all the ingredients needed to rescue Zhou Liang from his monstrous condition. Meet her at the Wood Shrine and utilize the Soulsever Incense to save him from his prison.
As the ingredients combined into this remedy, so too have our efforts combined into this chance to save Prince Liang.
"Where is the prince?"
The Prince's location is a secret known only to the Empress, Lingyun, and myself. I now induct you into our confidence.
The Prince's location is a secret known only to the Empress, her handmaiden and myself. I now induct you into our confidence.
He is contained within the Wood Shrine. And I will go with you. For in this endeavor, we share the burden and the hope.
He is contained beneath the Wood Shrine. And I will go with you. For in this endeavor, we share the burden and the hope.
He is contained beneath Ancient ruins. And I will go with you. For in this endeavor, we share the burden and the hope.
He is contained within Ancient ruins. And I will go with you. For in this endeavor, we share the burden and the hope.
He is contained within the Wood Shrine. And I will go with you. For in this endeavor, we share the burden and the hope.
Meet Sun Fuchun at the Wood Shrine
Burn the Soulsever Incense at the brazier
Enter the Wood Shrine
The trial below must be yours alone. Worry not, from this vantage I can best advise you and stoke the incense further.
Whherr– am…?
The incense is complete! I have done all I can to ensure its success and I am optimistic, though my trembling may say otherwise.
"I trust fully in your skills."
And I do appreciate that. Are you ready to begin? The rest falls to you.
"I am. Tell me what to do."
I reserve the honor of lighting this incense to you. Having done so, its medicinal properties will be activated as it disperses.
Once Prince Liang breathes enough, his soul and body should become… malleable. Your Azoth staff will do the rest.
The trial below must be yours alone. Worry not, from this vantage I can best advise you and stoke the incense further.
Defeat Zhou Liang to rescue his soul

string.comment: Stage whisper, projected to player down below her.
string.speaker: Sun Fuchun
string.name: AlchemistSun

resources.string: Good, he is calm. Those protective talismans should hold him still while he inhales the incense. Proceed with care.
(Angry unintelligible words)
Oh no! He must be immobilized! Replace those talismans - quickly!
Protect yourself! Use the talismans!
He's going to scream. Be careful!
Watch out! He's about to scream. The talismans will protect you!
(Pained unintelligible growling)
(Angry painful growling)
(Painful growling that vaguely sounds like "Mother")
Don't let him remove the talismans!
Quickly! He's trying to get rid of the talismans!
Stop him, or all our efforts are in vain!
(Pained unintelligible sucking in of breath)
(Frightened unintelligible sucking in of breath)
(Angry unintelligible sucking in of breath)
Well done! The poor boy… Be careful, Warden. I'll fan more incense from above!
(Pained unintelligible words)
Watch out! He's about to scream. The talismans will protect you!

string.comment: First sentence softly to herself. Second sentence calling out louder to player below.
string.speaker: Sun Fuchun
string.name: AlchemistSun

resources.string: I am sorry, little Prince, good medicine is always bitter. You are doing well Soulwarden, please hold on!
(Terrified unintelligible words)

string.comment: First sentence calling out louder to player below. Second sentence softly to herself, but also Liang.
string.speaker: Sun Fuchun
string.name: AlchemistSun

resources.string: I think it's working! Return to your senses, my Prince. Please… come back to us.

string.comment: First sentence softly to herself. Second sentence calling out louder to player below.
string.speaker: Sun Fuchun
string.name: AlchemistSun

resources.string: His body is exhausted… I think we've done all we can with this method.
(Exhausted heavy breathing with a mix of growls and unintelligible whispers, "Mother" can be heard)
We need one more… burst of power to push him over the edge!
After all this time… the Prince. Liang…
Return to Sun Fuchun atop the Wood Shrine
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the Soulsever Incense
Talk to Sun Fuchun about Zhou Liang's rescue
Incredible! It worked… we have extracted his human soul from his monstrous body. I… can't believe it.
"What do we do now?"
I'm sorry. I am... overcome. It has been so long. What we have accomplished is miraculous, but there is a long road ahead.
"But is he alright?"
Liang is restored, but he struggles to communicate… we must get him back to town, reacclimate him to human society.
I worry for his reticence and yet my heart is full to bursting at the sight of his sweet face.
You aren't... scared of me. Like everyone else was…
"No. We came to save you."
Then you are like… Mother. And that means… I could trust you. Couldn't I?
Return of the Child

Prince Liang has been saved from his affliction, fulfilling the Soulwarden's commitment to the alliance with Ebonscale Reach. Meet with Empress Zhou atop Serenity Monastery and present her son, healed and finally returned to her.
My body… feels strange. I think I was… like that… for far longer than I was ever in this form. Is this even... me?
"Would anything help remind you?"
Who I was before I… changed… is hazy. I can only remember… images from when I was younger, playing at the broken ships…
"I could search for a memento."
I think I recall… leaving my favorite toys there… but when I was just a child? Or after? My memories are… confused.
Travel to {POITags} to collect Zhou Liang's toys
Find {itemName}
Meet Sun and Liang in Fortune's Crossing
Meet Sun and Liang in Fortune's Crossing
Talk to Liang about his recovered toys
Talk to Sun Fuchun about Liang's condition
Read Liang's poem
There are so many more people in the world… than I remembered.
None of this fell out the way we expected, did it?
Just happened to be in town on business, and I hear tales of your heroics. I'm seeing light on the horizon.
Sun told me... how many years it has been. Were any of my toys still… in good condition?
"At least three. Here they are."
I see… I feel like there were far more than that. And yet…
Oh! I… remember this one! I was given this on that day when… when…
Mother and I stood watching the farmers. It was… early morning. The man waved at me. I was… happy and wished him well.
Mother…
There are so many more people in the world… than I remembered.
As far as I can tell, Liang is… physically healthy. I scarcely believe it.
"Will his mind recover, too?"
Slowly, I suspect. To be trapped inside that monstrous form for so long… it will take time to recover his faculties.
Slowly, I suspect. To be trapped inside that monstrous form for centuries… it will take time to recover his faculties.
We now must reunite Liang with his mother, a reunion long overdue. Grace has offered to help in this matter.
It's good to see Liang return to familiar surroundings… though I fear they aren't yet familiar in his mind.
I know that I too… have words inside. Unlike Mother's poems they are difficult to… find.

string.comment: Since this is written, his speech should (for the first time) be free of his previous troubles. We are hearing him without the disability his monsterous affliction left him with. His voice is strong, used with command, and warm. The Prince at his finest.
string.speaker: Zhou Liang
string.name: ZhouLiang

resources.string: The endless day with no hope of dawn Witnessed over one-hundred years of love And at daybreak I will become myself once more Remaining the loved and loving son of Dearest Mother

string.comment: Since this is written, his speech should (for the first time) be free of his previous troubles. We are hearing him without the disability his monsterous affliction left him with. His voice is strong, used with command, and warm. The Prince at his finest.
string.speaker: Zhou Liang
string.name: ZhouLiang

resources.string: I am not as I was. Time became an endless day with no hope of another dawn. But now I know that I was witness to over a century of love. One day, upon another dawn, I will become myself again and fulfill the long-held dreams of my Dearest Mother.

string.comment: Since this is written, his speech should (for the first time) be free of his previous troubles. We are hearing him without the disability his monsterous affliction left him with. His voice is strong, used with command, and warm. The Prince at his finest.
string.speaker: Zhou Liang
string.name: ZhouLiang

resources.string: The endless day with no hope of dawn Witnessed over one-hundred years of love And at daybreak I will become myself once more Remaining the loved and loving son of Dearest Mother

string.comment: Since this is written, his speech should (for the first time) be free of his previous troubles. We are hearing him without the disability his monsterous affliction left him with. His voice is strong, used with command, and warm. The Prince at his finest.
string.speaker: Zhou Liang
string.name: ZhouLiang

resources.string: The endless day with no hope of dawn Witnessed over a century of love And at daybreak I will become myself once more Remaining the loved and loving son of Dearest Mother
Talk to Grace O'Malley about escorting Liang
So Sun's found a role for me to play in this drama, after all. I'm to escort the young prince to a monastery down south.
"To be reunited with his mother."
I know, quite an honor! I've met Lords and Ladies, and even a Queen, but never an Empress.
Seems Sun wants a word with you, so I'll go on and take the little prince, and we'll see you there.
Check in with Sun Fuchun before meeting the Empress
I… wanted to speak before you go. This has been exhausting on many levels and I need rest before joining you.
"That's understandable."
I simply want to express my deepest gratitude. Despite the darkness we endured getting here, I am inspired.
You helped me achieve a dream I had abandoned, and I am forever in your debt. I will not forget this.
But I shouldn't delay you. I am sure the Empress will want to thank you as well. Go on. I will follow soon.
Meet up with Grace O'Malley and Prince Liang
Find out from Grace O'Malley why the Prince is not with her
Hell's breath, what took you so damn long? It's bloody madness - the Corrupted are here… and that harpy Isabella too.
"What happened?"
The Prince and I came along expecting to hike up to the monastery, and we ran right into them!
The Tempest and her elite guards must've had somewhere important to go… because they didn't give chase.
"Where's Prince Liang?"
I'm sorry, Warden, I was running and gunning, took out a slew of the bastards… but when I turned around, he had slipped away.
I'm betting he went on up to find his mother. A fierce yearning, he has, and he seemed to know the way.
"I'm going after him."
You do that. There's an army of Corrupted that way, but not much choice. Isabella went west, so I'll follow her. Stay sharp, Warden!
Follow Liang up the path to the Monastery
(Optional) Destroy the Corruption Barriers
Ascend to Empress Zhou atop Serenity Monastery
Talk to Empress Zhou about her healed son

string.comment: Was just rejected by the Empress. Upset, on the verge of sobbing (if he hasn't already been crying)
string.speaker: Zhou Liang
string.name: ZhouLiang

resources.string: It is me, Mother… it is…
I put my trust in you, and yet you parade before me this wretch who cannot speak? You dare mock Empress Zhou Taiying!?
"I assure you, this is your son."
I will not be fooled by some imposter! Liang remains an abomination, but I will remedy his affliction in my own way.
That is NOT my son! He still lives within this abomination, but I will remedy his affliction in my own way.
I accepted the Tempest's bargain, and she has given me an artifact to break the Stormwall. We set sail within the hour.
"You're making a mistake."
No, it is you who made a mistake. You have failed, Soulwarden, and so you will fall here… while we sail to freedom.
I go now to my Imperial Shipyard. The Shrine Guardian will ensure you do not follow.
Chase after Empress Zhou
Defeat Shrine Master Zhang
Follow Empress Zhou through the portal
Glad you're here - I'm in over me head. Managed to sneak up and listen. Seems Isabella went north to gather her forces.
"Empress Zhou plans to escape."
Yep. I saw the Empress too, in her full Crimson glory, and Liang trailing along behind her, the poor boy.
Fallen Dynasty

With Empress Zhou fallen to Corruption and determined to sail away from Aeternum, Prince Liang is in danger and so is the rest of the world. On Grace O'Malley's advice, gain access to the Royal Pier and the Empress's ship.
If I was placing a bet, I'd wager the Empress is planning to give Isabella the slip and leave without her.
"We can't let her set sail."
Then we'll need to move fast. The Empress is already headed for the docks, and that area's locked down tight.
I heard something about the Fleet Admirals each carrying a Seal of Command that can get you through.
"I'll get the Seals then."
Better you than me. Meantime, I'll see if I can sneak back there and get on board the Empress's ship.
Never let it be said that Grace O'Malley turned tail at perilous odds and the opportunity to claim a vessel!
Gain Access to Dynasty Harborage
Reach the bridge that leads to the Imperial Palace
Fight to the Palace Causeways to reach the Empress
Defeat Fleet Admiral Huang for his Seal of Command
Take Fleet Admiral Huang's Seal of Command
Defeat Fleet Admiral Xin for his Seal of Command
Take Fleet Admiral Xin's Seal of Command
Rush to the Harborage to prevent the Empress from sailing
Defeat Fleet Admiral Po for his Seal of Command
Take Fleet Admiral Po's Seal of Command
You have the Seals yet? You better hurry! The Empress is about to shove off!
You have the Seals yet? You better hurry! The Empress is about to shove off!
Did you get the Seals? Not a second too soon! They're across the water there - and I spotted the Empress giving that artifact to her captain.
A Mother's Dream
With access to the Royal Pier attained, Empress Zhou can now be reached and stopped from escaping Aeternum. Confront and defeat her before Ebonscale Reach falls further into Corruption.
I can handle the captain, but I'm not so sure about the Empress. Since when can the Corrupted float around like that?
"I'll deal with the Empress."
A solid plan, but I got an addendum. What say we shut down the Empress's enterprise and then me and you snag that artifact?
I can whip up a crew in the blink of an eye, and we can get off this damned rock for once and all.
"Without stopping the Tempest?"
Well, she won’t have any boats, so… bah, I can already tell you're dead set on a showdown, so why waste my breath?
I understand where you're coming from, of course. And you're right... we have a task at hand, so let's get to it, shall we?
Once more unto the beach!
Take a boat to the Royal Pier and confront Empress Zhou
Enter the Royal Pier
Defeat Empress Zhou
Soon will I leave this island, and sickness will have no meaning!
You are unworthy!
Only I can save my son!
My exile will soon be over. We will return home in full glory!
The Heavens bless Empress Zhou alone!
This insect dares to threaten a dragon!
I control Corruption. It is my newest, loyal subject!
Let Corruption fill the Heavens!
By Corruption's blessing will Liang be saved!
Empress Zhou will welcome the Lost Prince home!
Bow before your ruler, Empress Zhou Taiying!
I am the Ascendant Dragon, She-Who-Devours-the-Sky!

string.comment: Occurs when Empress is defeated in combat.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: No! Only the Empress is worthy of Corruption's blessing! You are nothing…

string.comment: Occurs when Empress is defeated in combat.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: We were to be reunited…!

string.comment: Occurs when Empress is defeated in combat.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: My Liang…

string.comment: These are for coverage. We could explore them as ALTs for the Empress's defeat, sad and fading out. Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: The sun… the sun…

string.comment: These are for coverage. We could explore them as ALTs for the Empress's defeat, sad and fading out. Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: The rising sun…

string.comment: These are for coverage. We could explore them as ALTs for the Empress's defeat, sad and fading out. Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: For… give… me…

string.comment: These are for coverage. We could explore them as ALTs for the Empress's defeat, sad and fading out. Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Shadowed… pinnacle…

string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Rush… of… wind…

resources.string: Swaddled… newborn…

string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Re…be…hold…

string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Heavenly… ascension…

Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Heavenly…

string.comment: These are for coverage. We could explore them as ALTs for the Empress's defeat, sad and fading out. Also, they might be nice as barks during the battle as if she is struggling to keep her mind in control and not overwhelmed by Corruption, and therefore that kind of reading would be more commanding.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Ascension…
Search for Prince Liang and Sun Fuchun on the shore
I have only seen and heard a little of what transpired, but I fear to learn this story in full…
The New Rising Sun

Corrupted Empress Zhou is defeated and her tragic ambitions thwarted. In the aftermath of destruction, the Soulwarden have lost a powerful ally. But Prince Liang is safe, and Ebonscale Reach is secure from further Corruption. Debrief with your allies and plan next steps in the fight against the Tempest.
Is it true? The Empress, fallen to Corruption? I did not think it possible of someone so strong.
"None of us are immune."
Indeed. Yonas… I now feel Yash's pain, keenly. I owe him an apology, I think.
For now, I must help Liang, though. I'll take him back to town. Please join us there as soon as you're able.
The Heavens are… so quiet now.
Retrieve the scroll case that washed ashore

string.comment: Written by the Empress before she accepted Corruption. She is in full command of her senses, and takes the choice into Corruption willingly. That said, this poem is a 'just in case' she loses her wits. She wants her son to know that she is doing this for his benefit, regardless of the consequences to her mind.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: My body falls from this shadowed pinnacle With a step taken into the rush of wind Swaddled newborn it will bear you up To rebehold the rising sun in heavenly ascension

string.comment: Written by the Empress before she accepted Corruption. She is in full command of her senses, and takes the choice into Corruption willingly. That said, this poem is a 'just in case' she loses her wits. She wants her son to know that she is doing this for his benefit, regardless of the consequences to her mind.
string.speaker: Empress Zhou
string.name: EmpressZhou

resources.string: Atop the shadowed pinnacles I climbed, recalling my homeland. Those distant peaks I lost before you too could ascend. Yet that regret falls along with my body with this step I take from the cliff. I believe the winds will catch you, swaddled newborn, lifting upwards into the sky. At the zenith will you behold the light I always watched as the sun rises again in Heavenly ascension.
Return to Fortune's Crossing with the poem
Present the Empress's Poem to Zhou Liang
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the Prince's return
We will speak in a moment, Warden.
We will speak in a moment, Warden.
I bring word from Great Cleave and beyond. Once you are ready, we should strategize.
I bring word from Great Cleave and beyond. Once you are ready, we should strategize.
This is… for me?
"I found it washed ashore."
Oh! This was her favorite poem by Du Fu… "Over Kuizhou's lonely wall, the setting sun slants..."
We read this every autumn when the wind was in the reeds. You could hear them… even from the heights of the Palace.
"What will you do now?"
Remember her. Regain what I had lost. And, above all, continue what she taught me to do… all those years ago… for our people.
Rule with generosity of spirit.
Ohh, how I have missed the deepness of the sky…
That was... kind of you. I hope with that, Liang can find closure and begin a new life. But he is going to need help.
"You should stay with him."
It is not an easy decision, but it is the right thing for me to do.
I feel particularly bad walking away at this time, with Grace departing so… abruptly. I am sorry.
"We do what we have to."
Indeed. The Prince has a long recovery ahead… I must prepare him, for he is soon to be – if he is not already – our Emperor.
Heavens watch over you, Warden. Please give my regards to Yash.
Empress Zhou always wanted Liang to one day rule in her stead, regardless of the immortality bestowed on this island.
Empress Zhou always wanted Liang to one day rule in her stead, regardless of the immortality of people on this island.
I mourn the loss of Empress Zhou. It seems she was an exemplary leader, but at least there is a path forward.
With Ebonscale as an ally, and at least some small blow against the Tempest, I'd say the Soulwardens are back.
"What word from Great Cleave?"
More than Great Cleave! I bring word from regions beyond as well!
Taiying attempted to deceive me, but we are fast friends now…
Despite your actions, she is now bound to me and Corruption! Her people will soon follow.
Despite your actions, she is now bound to me and Corruption!
You will give into Corruption! And so will all of Ebonscale Reach!
Our fleet has been remade! And when we set sail, we will corrupt the world!
Our fleet is ready! And when we set sail, we will corrupt the world!
The Tormented Prince
Weaken Prince Liang
Watch over Prince Liang as the incense takes effect
Subdue Prince Liang
Use skills or heavy attacks to immobilize Liang with talismans
Free Prince Liang
Use your Azoth staff to free Liang's soul
Aaaaaaaahhhhhhh!!!
Whelp! Seems you got things well enough in hand here.
As do I!
Not to mention my new ship yonder.
What a beauty, eh?
Just imagine all the unknowns she'll make known.
The bounty and loot she'll uncover.
The wild seas she'll tame.
Excuse me, ma'am.
Ma'am?!
That'd be…
Captain O'Malley!
And don't you forget it!
Hahahaha! (Oh, my spine…)
I know, I know... abandoning the cause…
But I still got anchors back in the Old World I just can't cut loose...
By the way. You really would make a fine First Mate, you know.
Just saying!
Aah… Grace O'Malley... You better know what you're doing…
